circumstances: Enroute, the right engine failed and caught fire. The captain reduced his altitude and attempted an emergency landing in a swampy area located near Isiolo. The aircraft crash landed and was damaged beyond repair while all 15 occupants were able to evacuate safely. Crew from the 216th Squadron.
probable_cause: The fire on the right engine was caused by the failure of a fuel line. The fuel spill in the nacelle and then caught fire.
